ceo_buyer.justification: The contact information lists 'Timothy Morrison Trigg Minerals Limited Chairman'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction is the submission of an Exploration Licence Application (ELA), and no specific percentage of interest acquired is mentioned in the documents.

currency.justification: No monetary transaction values are mentioned, so currency is not applicable.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is the submission of an Exploration Licence Application (ELA), not a purchase for cash. No cash payment is mentioned.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is the submission of an Exploration Licence Application (ELA), not a purchase for shares. No share payment is mentioned.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction is the submission of an Exploration Licence Application (ELA), and no combined cash and share payment is mentioned.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of this transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued, so no share price is applicable.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text mentions future drilling plans but does not specify a commitment in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text mentions future exploration plans but does not specify a monetary commitment.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Trigg plans to conduct systematic exploration, including geophysical surveys, sampling, and drilling programs, to test the depth extensions of the historically productive Bukkulla Mine and explore high-priority targets within the Nundle Goldfield.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: Trigg plans to conduct systematic exploration, including geophysical surveys, sampling, and drilling programs, to test the depth extensions of the historically productive Bukkulla Mine and explore high-priority targets within the Nundle Goldfield.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or equivalent was mentioned as part of the transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: ELA 6870 (Bukkulla Antimony Project): Covers 87km² (29 units) of highly prospective ground...

coverage_area_unit.justification: ELA 6870 (Bukkulla Antimony Project): Covers 87km² (29 units) of highly prospective ground...

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain a quantified mineral resource for the Bukkulla project. The JORC table commentary states, 'The data spacing and distribution was not intended and is not sufficient to establish the degree of geological and grade continuity appropriate for the Mineral Resource and Ore Reserve estimation procedure(s) and classifications applied.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Trigg Minerals Limited (ASX: TMG) is pleased to announce it has submitted three Exploration Licence Applications (ELAs)...
